Name: Haste Elixir
Description: Brewed at Castle Village by Camilla. You'll feel lighter on your feet.

NameLocalization.ja: スピードのエリクサー

DescriptionLocalization.de: Im Schlossdorf von Camilla gebraut. Du wirst fühlen leichter an deinen Füßen.
DescriptionLocalization.es: Elaborado en Castle Village por Camilla. Te sentirás más ligero en tus pies.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Brassée à Castle Village par Camilla. Vous vous sentirez plus léger sur vos pieds.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Főzött Camilla kastélyfalujában. Érezni fogod könnyebb a lábadon.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Prodotta al Castle Village da Camilla. Ti sentirai più leggero sui tuoi piedi.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: カミラがキャッスルビレッジで醸造。あなたは感じるでしょう 足元を軽くします。
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 카밀라가 캐슬 빌리지에서 양조했습니다. 당신은 느낄 것이다 발이 가벼워 요.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Fabricada no Castelo Village por Camilla. Você sentirá mais leve em seus pés.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Приготовлено в замковой деревне Камиллой. Вы почувствуете легче на ногах.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Camilla tarafından Castle Village'de demlendi. Hissedeceksin ayaklarınızda daha hafif.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 卡米拉在城堡村酿造。你会觉得 脚更轻。
